description:
Amendment of previously approved scheme (January 2000) for four storey housing development by the addition of an additional (4th) storey to contain 2 further two bedroom flats.  Increasing the height of the lift motor room by one storey.  Minor alterations to front and side facades. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  RT8436.07A, 05, 04, 01A, 02, 06, 03;                         PM1623 DL 24A, 22B, 23C, 20A, 21A                         (previously approved drawings)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
